original_title: Rhod Gilbert and the Award-Winning Mince Pie
overview: Following two sell-out UK tours, multi-award winning Welsh wonder Rhod Gilbert presents his eagerly awaited debut stand-up DVD. One of the UK’s hottest comedians, Rhod takes observational humour to a whole new level with his fantastical ranting on life’s minor irritations.
title: Rhod Gilbert and the Award-Winning Mince Pie
